At the end of the week, we held rallies in Ankara and Istanbul to 'Respect the National Idea'.
We made the biggest rally of the Republican history in Ankara on Saturday, Sunday in Istanbul and started the local elections.
Not just the area, there were miles of people on the way to the area. This rally has shown your nationality's reaction to these events.
After the rally, millions of our citizens went to their houses without burning anything.
Do you think we have received the message of those who are constantly gathered in Taksim, have they received the message in Xinjiang and Kazliçesme?
This nation does not support an action initiated with a lie. Those who gathered in Xinjiang and then in Kazlıçeşme broke this game.
Those who call an activist in Taksim and say 'Turkey standing' came from ignoring it when millions of people came out of the streets.
We will continue to show the true sensitivity of the nation to both the inside treasurers and the outside collaborators.
We will continue these rallies in Kayseri on Friday, in Samsun on Saturday and in Erzurum on Sunday.
If they want to know the true photograph of Turkey, their true sensitivity, they will look around.
There are some NGOs in Turkey. Yesterday they took action to quit. Your call is against the law.
Turkish Tabipleri Birliği How do you go to this action. Where is your human love, where is your sick love?
I want to draw attention to the members of such organizations. Pay attention to these growing trade unions and organizations.
The more leftists are playing against the capitalism and playing in the commercial of the bank, the more lefties these unionists and organizers are.

Three years ago on May 27, 2010 CHP made the general assembly and elected the new president.
This new president was welcomed by the CHP's citizens.
The CHP had hoped for effective opposition to the electorate, but the new leader made a huge disappointment from the first day.
He could not fill his seat, he was very weak. He was driving every day. Every day a new place appeared.

The new #Iranian #President expressed himself quite clearly; he is the author of the doctrine that one can term "talk and enrich"
in other words "talk and continue to enrich uranium for #nuclear #weapons." We can not accept something that falls short of the following:
A. The total cessation of all enrichment activity at all levels. B. The removal of all the enriched material from Iran
C. The closure of all the illegal nuclear installations. Till #Iran meets these obligations, it is necessary to intensify the pressure.
The #Iranian #nuclear #program must be halted. Period.
Read my # G8 closing remarks here: http://t.co/1E3gVacYlT # G8UK
Today, we are delighted to announce that Emirates is the best airline in the world, based on a vote of more than 18 million passengers in 160 countries.
Emirates is one of the signs of excellence in the UAE, which we want in all sectors .. to achieve the best centers in the world
We started the company in 1985 with two chartered planes. Today, the company has about 200 aircraft and 60,000 employees.
Pleased upon hearing that Emirates Airlines was voted 'World's Best Airline' by over 18 million travelers from 160 countries ..
Emirates Airlines is a national symbol of excellence..something we strive for in all sectors..to achieve the best rankings globally ..
Emirates started in 1985 with 2 leased planes.Now they have 200 planes & 60k employees.Its not about modest beginnings but limitless ambition
